body.data: Adding Font Awesome Icons to our project is AWESOME

data: To use the Font Awesome icons, add the following line inside the <head> section of your HTML page: <link rel='stylesheet' href='https://cdnjs.cloudflare.com/ajax/libs/font-awesome/4.7.0/css/font-awesome.min.css'> Note: No downloading or installation is required!
